step_data.thought: I've already filled in the template name and subject. Now I need to continue filling in the required fields. I see that 'Sender Name' and 'Sender Email' fields are already populated with 'CustomerSupport' and 'support@example.com' respectively, which are acceptable values. The next important field to focus on is the 'Template Content' which currently only has an unsubscribe link. For a holiday promotion newsletter, I need to create compelling content that showcases holiday offers. I should add holiday-themed content to the template, including a greeting, promotional details, and keep the unsubscribe link at the bottom as required by email marketing regulations.
step_data.action:
fill('848', '

Happy Holidays from Our Store!

Dear {{var customer.name}},

The holiday season is here, and we're celebrating with our biggest sale of the year!

Special Holiday Offers:

  • 30% OFF all winter apparel
  • Buy one, get one 50% OFF on selected items
  • Free shipping on orders over $50
  • Gift wrapping services available

Sale ends December 24th - Don't miss out!

Shop now at
